content.rendered:
Directed by Pia Sukanya.

Written by Pia Sukanya. Aarti S. Bagdi.

Cast Radhika Apte(Meghna). Akshay Oberoi(Abhishek). Siddhant Kapoor(Biker (as Siddhanth Kapoor)). Ravi Kishan(Karan Kapoor). Adil Hussain(Pandya). Shilpa Shukla(Irawati Angre). Ajinkya Deo(Commissioner Wadia). Amit Sial(CID Gujral) . Mukesh Agrohari(Security Gaurd). Saniya Anklesaria(Alice D’Mello). Abhijit Bhor(Abhishek’s Dad). Uday Chandra(Chacha). Paromita Chatterjee(Abhishek’s Ma). Shailesh Hejmady(Constable Dheere). Bharat Jha(Karan Kapoor’s Manager). Dhanendra Kawde(Jija). Mohammad Salman Khan(Salman). Anjali Khurana(Archie’s Girl). Durgesh Kumar(Yadav). Nishant Lal(Balwinder). Abhishek Narayan(Arun Naik). Mohamed Othman((as Mohamed Osman)). Archana L. Pania(RJ Archana). Sharon Prabhakar(Nandini’s Mother). Vikash Rajput(Vikash Rajput). Sunil Shanbag(Papa). Denzil Smith(Nandini’s Father). Pia Sukanya(Nandini). Sumeet Thakur(Jazz). Sanjay Tripathi(Charch father). Akshat Verma(Arif Hussein)

Language Hindi.

Producers Aarti S. Bagdi. Surendra Bagdi. Colin Burrows. Naved Farooqui. Phil Hunt. Atul Pandey. Compton Ross. Elliot Ross. Fenella Ross. Yogiraj Shetty. Sameer Siddiqui. Michael E. Ward.

Production JSR Productions House. JSR Productions.
